segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely focused on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing and creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already wet, but she doesn't seem to mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching her, hoping she doesn't slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like the stool is about to tip over, but he's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself while the woman is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen if she turns around and sees the mess and the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me feel a bit on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR
